content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I find this well-priced apartment highly desirable and in high demand. To secure it, I expect a competitive price. However, as we begin negotiations, let me start with a slightly higher proposal than what you might expect, say 1250 Euros per month. Max, if you find this unacceptable, do let me know your suggested price with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' or end the negotiation with a reason using 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't find this proposal sufficiently advantageous for me, Max. My expectations are higher, as I mentioned earlier. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
